title: Auslander-type conditions and weakly Gorenstein algebras
abstract:
Let $R$ be an Artin algebra. Under certain Auslander-type conditions, we give
some equivalent characterizations of (weakly) Gorenstein algebras in terms of
the properties of Gorenstein projective modules and modules satisfying
Auslander-type conditions. As applications, we provide some support for several
homological conjectures. In particular, we prove that if $R$ is left quasi
Auslander, then $R$ is Gorenstein if and only if it is (left and) right weakly
Gorenstein; and that if $R$ satisfies the Auslander condition, then $R$ is
Gorenstein if and only if it is left or right weakly Gorenstein. This is a
reduction of an Auslander--Reiten's conjecture, which states that $R$ is
Gorenstein if $R$ satisfies the Auslander condition.
